constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 192 (Tuesday, November 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MACE:
H.R. 5822
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
[Page H6125]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.

title: To extend Federal recognition to the Edisto Natchez-Kusso Tribe of South Carolina, and for other purposes.
